Author: Hoc
Name: MoveMeXiv
Punchline: Destination-first travel â€” get your character anywhere with one command.
Description: A unified travel plugin that chains data center, world, aetheryte, and coordinate movement into seamless journeys. Mounts up and smoothly moves to coordinates, supports aetheryte teleportation, world travel (native + Lifestream IPC), coordinate bookmarks, and remote control via Discord bot.
